ModSecurity
============

.. caution:: ModSecurity v3 Module is in early development and has known stability issues. Do NOT use in production

.. note:: ModSecurity support is only available on CentOS7/CloudLinux7 and provided for testing purposes only

Install ModSecurity
---------------------
::

  yum --enablerepo=ndeploy install nginx-nDeploy-module-modsecurity

Once installed ModSecurity can be turned on/off for a domain from the Xtendweb cPanel user interface under "Application Settings"
